Joseph Konowiecki, J.D. jkonowiecki@moriahpartners.com

â€¢ Mr. Konowiecki was managing and strategic partner at K&R (previously Konowiecki & Rank.) He led the firm into becoming 50 + lawyers and his areas of practice included health care, M&A, corporate, securities, and general business. He has extensive M&A experience including having lead multiple acquisitions and sales in healthcare such as FHP, AMS and Pacificare. Mr. Konowiecki also has a deep understanding of the health industry regulatory environment both at the state and federal levels. As General Counsel and Executive Vice President for PacifiCare Health Systems, Inc., one of the nation’s largest consumer health organizations, he was instrumental in closing its $9.2 billion sale to United Health Group in less than six months. â€¢ Mr. Konowiecki has led some of the largest healthcare public offerings and mergers in the country and successfully argued before the U.S. Supreme Court in the case of PacifiCare Health Systems vs. Book, leading to a favorable, unanimous decision by the high court. â€¢ Mr. Konowiecki has been an investor and trusted advisor to several market-leading companies including PriceGrabber.com, Digital Interactive, Media Technologies and United States Football Club. Mr. Konowiecki also has wide experience in early stage financing including PriceGrabber.com, Digital Interactive and U.S.F.C. (United States Football Club). â€¢ Mr. Konowiecki serves on various non-profit boards, most recently the Healthcare Advisory Board for RAND. Mr. Konowiecki is a graduate of U.C.L.A. and holds a Juris Doctorate degree from the UC Hastings College of the Law.
